title: Ultimate 3BR/3BA Condo - 5245 Coldwater Canyon Avenue C
posting_body: ['Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location', 'Designed with your comfort in mind, the custom-designed floor plan features a character-filled interior and comes equipped with generous living spaces.', 'Fall in love with this well-equipped updated kitchen, outfitted with brand new countertops, stove, microwave, and sink in the kitchen.', 'Enjoy a cup of tea or an evening wine on the large deck right off the living room.', 'There’s also an optional doggie door included for pet access to the deck.', 'Sleep soundly in the spacious main bedroom that offers an ensuite bathroom and a custom-designed walk-in closet.', 'Inviting and traditional, the main bathroom is well-maintained and features a spa shower, soaking tub, and his-and-hers sinks.', 'This house comes with a recently replaced roof-mounted central AC/Heater unit.', 'Other features include wall-mounted bike racks, a second freezer, and shelving for storage in the oversized two car-garage,   Enjoy community living in Sherman Oaks.', "Be prepared for 'love at first sight'.", 'We love this home.', 'You will too.', 'Call today..', '** Tenant pays for electricity, water, gas, and cable/internet.', '** Tenant(s) will be responsible for following any HOA-mandated “Rules & Responsibilities” and “Covenants, Conditions & Restrictions.”', '**', '** Tenant is responsible for any HOA Move in/Move out fees if applicable**', '** Security Deposit is equal to 1x the monthly rent based upon approved credit.', '(NOTE: In CA, can increase security deposits to 2x rent.', 'Please see the statement of rental criteria here: <URL>', '**', 'If you are interested in applying, please email', 'show contact info', 'or text', 'show contact info', 'to request an application.', 'Please note that applications are reviewed in the order received and application fees are not refundable.', '**']
